node.hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
node.detail_zh: 患者為第 85 宗患者的哥哥，有長期病患，居於大坑道 8 號。他沒出現病徵，因被列作密切接觸者早前被安排入住檢疫中心。其深喉唾液樣本對病毒呈陽性反應，被送往東區尤德夫人那打素醫院接受治療。患者於潛伏期內沒有外遊。他於 2 月 22 日出席其女兒的婚宴，其時其妹妹（第 85 宗患者）亦有出席。其同住妻子沒有出現病徵，現正接受檢疫。
node.detail_en: The patient with underlying illness is the elder brother of patient no. 85. He lives at 8 Tai Hang Road. He is asymptomatic and has earlier been sent to the quarantine centre as a close contact. His deep throat saliva specimen was tested positive. He was sent to Pamela Youde Nethersole Eastern Hospital for treatment The patient had no travel history during the incubation period. He attended his daughter's wedding banquet on Feb 22 where his younger sister (patient no. 85) was also present. His wife is asymptomatic and is under quarantine.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 馬主家族首名確診患者為馬主周巧兒，及後其兄嫂及兩名家傭先後確診，其松鼠狗曾驗出對病毒呈弱陽性反應。
groups.description_en: A female horse owner was the first confirmed case of the family, having spread to her elder brother and sister-in-law, and her 2 domestic helpers. Her dog was also tested "weak positive" to the coronavirus.

node.remarks_zh: 患者為租戶職員，最後到辦公室的日期為 2 月 23 日，當日曾作短暫停留
node.remarks_en: The patient is the staff of a tenant. He last went to the office and stayed a while on Feb 23.

node.location_zh: 香港賽馬會跑馬地會所
node.location_en: Hong Kong Jockey Club Happy Valley Clubhouse
node.remarks_zh: 於婚宴後於 2 月 23 日到訪跑馬地會所美食廣場，亦曾於 2 月 18 日及 21 日前往六化郎咖啡室、於 2 月 15 日及 20 日到訪美食廣場，以及於 2 月 14 日前往打吡酒吧
node.remarks_en: Visited the Food Plaza on the premises on Feb 23 after attending his daughter’s wedding banquet, Six Furlong restaurant on Feb 18 and 21, the Food Plaza on Feb 15 and 20 and the Derby Bar on Feb 14

node.location_zh: 香港 JW 萬豪酒店
node.remarks_zh: 患者與妻子（第 104 宗患者）出席女兒的婚宴，與一班親友（約 20 人）在包廳共膳，共開了兩枱，當時其妹妹（第 85 宗患者）亦有出席
node.remarks_en: The patient attended his daughter's wedding banquet where his younger sister (patient no. 85) was also present, and dined with around 20 relatives and friends in a private room (2 tables) afterwards.
